website_summaries.verdict: Rear tire that has a design made for providing both stability and comfort.
pros: Works equally well in wet or dry road conditions
Tire carries a low price point, so it will provide a good value
Seems to resist punctures over time
Gives the rider a nice grip on the road when used on dry pavement
cons: Made more as an entry-level type of tire, so it won’t last a long time

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old tire being sold as new?
customer_reviews.text: The “born-on-date” on this 180 rear tire is 2117, that’s 2 years old from when I received it on 6/21/2019. The 120 front tire that came along as a set is only 6 months old (5018), which is more the norm with other tires I’ve purchased in the past. To the seller, I’m just wondering why this item wasn’t released earlier as a sale from inventory?
customer_reviews.author: E-man

customer_reviews.title: More Sport Oriented Than Touring
customer_reviews.text: I have worn out several of these tires. I have also decided that they are fairly sticky and turn in quickly. I get about 3500 / 4000 miles out of the rear tires and about 4500 out of the fronts. I recommend these tires and will probably buy another set. Make sure the motorcycle shop you deal with will mount customer supplied tires.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good tire, good price, free Prime shipping
customer_reviews.text: I installed the Continental ContiMotion on my BMW oilhead. Haven't been in the rain yet. The tires are working well on the dry paved rural mountain roads in Alaska for a sport touring motorcycle. Winter is fast approaching so the mileage wear evaluation will not be until next season.
customer_reviews.author: Seahawk

customer_reviews.title: Fresh tread
customer_reviews.text: Good tire for the money. Got over 5k miles out of it. I do alot of highway riding. And it was a fresh tire. Only a couple months old when recieved.
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Good tire, had these kind on before and got 4500 or more miles on them. Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, reliable, price competitive.
customer_reviews.text: Great tire. Good grip on the road. Have not tried in wet conditions, but again I won't be needing to do so as I don't ride in the rain. Have about 600 miles on the tire and it has barely shown wear. GREAT! Will purchase again next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tire
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great tire we had heard lots of negative things about these tires but they are great and wonderful value for your dollar highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: vicky eady

customer_reviews.title: Nice tire, grips well
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels exactly like the stock tire that came with my Fz09! It breaks in very well and is super sticky for when I travel down the mountain as I ride to work.
customer_reviews.author: Nick G

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: You can not beat the price for a set of these tires i have been running them for years on my bike and will continue to do so. I have had nothing but good things to say about them.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good all-around tire for the money
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tire on my bike for about 4 months now, and it performs great. Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Contimotion tires for fjr
customer_reviews.text: Second rear tire for the matching front, the rear tire seems to last about 3500 miles max on my FJR. These tires handle very nice and grip the road well.Carcass of the tire is very thin when worn down to the end of it's tread life! Bargain prices can be found for these tires, but the short life is a trade off when you factor mounting costs in.
customer_reviews.author: greg hanson

customer_reviews.title: Good tire
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it grips the road. Good in the rain. I would recommend to my family and friends. When u don't have the money to purchase high end name tires such as Pirelli this works just fine
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Good tire.. just realized I’ve had it in for a year and it’s just now near needing replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Great tire for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great tire for the price. I'm using it on a first gen FZ1 and have never had a problem
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this tire..Performs as well if not better than tires twice its price..
customer_reviews.author: Eric Stockwell

customer_reviews.title: Great tread
customer_reviews.text: Great tires I've put more than 4000 miles on them and they are still good
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks better in person.. Thanks.. will order another set asap
customer_reviews.author: Quincy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great tire for the price
customer_reviews.text: I received the tire in just a few days of ordering. The tire has good wear life and handles great on my bike. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Powerstroke04

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a great deal and it rides good on my bike to ...
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy wood

customer_reviews.title: It's ok for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were ok until I switched to Michelin Power 2ct's and damn what a difference, could feel the increased grip, stability and agility immediately. Made the contimotions feel like they were made of hard rock in comparison. Tires really do make a huge difference. The contimotions will do if you're on a budget but I'd save up asap for better tires.
customer_reviews.author: MetalBaby

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a very great product for a person on a budget, will probably buy again. Will return for a front tire pretty soon
customer_reviews.author: Bigboi806

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: WAS SUPRISINGLY SPEEDY DELIVERY. AND NOT ONLY LOOKS GOOD ON MY BIKE, IT DELIVERS GREAT PREFORMANCE! I WOULD ABSOLUTELY RECOMMEND THIS TIRE
customer_reviews.author: Janet Van Patten

customer_reviews.title: Bought Tire from Amazon and looks used
customer_reviews.text: Bought Tire from Amazon and looks used. It was all dirty and the tags were all removed. I am going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: sport bike tire
customer_reviews.text: this will be my 4th and last conti tire I will buy . I am giving it one last shot. I have now put 4 rear tires and only 1 front tire on my bike. it picks up nails and screws like a magnent and the tire wears out quickly. I do not do burn outs I do not understand.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL MUNI

customer_reviews.title: Kinda sketchy
customer_reviews.text: It's decent. Not great. Not impressed with the wet grip. And I got this buldge in it now. I bought a cheap tire because I burn through them in 2500 miles. I'm kinda worried about this one. Check out the pic. Another thing. These tires are old. Most shops won't even put a tire on that's more than 2 years old. The replacement tire they sent is from 2013. That's 4 years old. That's dangerous
customer_reviews.author: Jake

product_meta.title: Continental ContiMotion Sport/Touring Motorcycle Tire Rear 180/55-17
product_meta.description: New premium brand all-season Sport Touring radial for the price conscious rider.
feature_bullets: Brand new concept radial for the entry level market
Safe and reliable feedback on both dry and wet roads
Value for money mileage due to new formulated polymers in the compound
0° Steel-belt construction on the rear for excellent stability and ride comfort

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars52 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
